comment._content: Battle of Leipzig, 1813, a turning point in the war against Napoleon. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Battle_of_the_Nations

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Battle_Of_The_Nations-Monument... (shown on Wikipedia page above) for a 2003 photo of the memorial in this picture.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Monument was erected in 1913, for the centennial anniversary of the battle:
